item.title: Whats in your toolbox?
item.description: If I walk into my garage now and open up a toolbox, whats inside? Here’s a quick selection: Ball-peen hammer Jointer plane 1⁄2 inch mortise chisel Soldering iron Set square Low angle block plane Torx screw drivers Hack saw Monkey wrench Pipe cutter Notice it doesn’t just contain: A sledge hammer. Different tools have different purposes, you wouldn’t use a hammer and try to cut down a tree, or use a chisel to hammer a nail.
